entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 4:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: ESE 54 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this evening then to rain showers near midnight. Rain along the coast early this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 90 km/h gusting to 110 except gusting to 160 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
